About

I live in Olathe, KS with my awesome fiancé Katie Phillips and work full-time as a Software Engineer for ScriptPro LLC.

I graduated from Kansas State University with a bachelor's degree in Information Systems and a minor in Business.

I truly enjoy my line of work and always strive to write well documented, maintainable, and functional code.

Methodology

I've done away with my "arsenal" of tools that I once felt made me a better Engineer. Being a better Engineer is not about tools it's about solving problems in an efficient and effective manner. Logically I'm not going to say a certain tool or set of tools make me a better Engineer.

I have worked with many technologies and believe that I can solve almost any problem that is thrown at me. Please take a look at my résumé (it's under the Portfolio section) to see a detailed description of my professional experiences.
